description: Brocade SANnav licenses (or equivalent) with support and maintenance – February 1, 2024 to January 31, 2025
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
================================

### Overview

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Brocade SANnav licenses with support and maintenance for a period of 12 months.

### Key Tender Details

*   **Invitation Reference Number:** SSC-23-00025032:T
*   **Procurement Title:** Brocade SANnav licenses 2023/24
*   **Procurement Category:** General Defender Procurements (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Invitation to Bid
*   **Tender Closure Date:** January 18, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
*   **End User:** Shared Services Canada
*   **Supply Category:** ADP Input-Output and Storage Devices (N7025)

### Tender Requirements

The successful Bidder will be required to provide Brocade SANnav licenses (or equivalent) with support and maintenance for a period of 12 months, from February 1, 2024, to January 31, 2025.

### Bid Submission

All bids must be submitted through the SSC Public Procurement Portal (P2P) by the deadline indicated on page 1 of the bid solicitation. Bidders must register in the SSC P2P portal to access the solicitation, submit a response, and receive updates and amendments.

### Important Dates

*   **Publication Date:** December 28, 2023
*   **Amendment Date (3):** January 11, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 18, 2024, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** January 31, 2025

### Contact Details

For further information, please contact Sandra Ladouceur at (613) 302-0766.

### Related Documents

For the complete tender package and bidder instructions, please visit the SSC Public Procurement Portal (P2P) at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca). The following documents are available for download:

\*   Brocade SANnav licenses 2023/24 - Amendment 003
